Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
CAN: The student can draw two people with a general representation of a string telephone connecting them. (Basic outline of the cups and string present)
The student can partially illustrate that the string between the cups is important for communication. (May attempt to show sound traveling through the string)
The student can label some parts of the string telephone, such as one of the cups or the string, with varying accuracy.
CANNOT: The student is likely unable to consistently demonstrate that the string must be pulled tight for effective sound transmission. (May show the string sagging or miss this detail)
The student may not fully explain how the string telephone works for communication over a distance. (Simple explanation or unclear description)
The student might not include all necessary labels or might mislabel parts of the device. (Inconsistent or missing labels)
